title: Can i See GOD? | Sri Madhu Pandit Dasa
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.text: When people ask, can you show me God?
Prabhupada is replying, you want to show me God?
Yeah, I'll show you. You qualify, ready?
Come on, chant Hare Krishna.
Follow four regulated principles.
My job is that only, Prabhupada is saying.
My job is to show you all God.
Where is the question of challenge?
To everybody I want to show God.
That's why this movement is there, to show everybody God.
But to show everybody God, first I am qualifying them.
I am awakening their spiritual bodies, spiritual senses.
And then they can see God, they can see spiritual world.
See, achintya guna surupam, not material gunas.
There is a rupa.
To go into the ocean of spiritual experience,
start hearing from avyatta margavit.
Start hearing from such personalities,
who can see things beyond,
your perception.
And then, after hearing,
you practice it,
then you will also become a
avyatta margavit.
